Trade/Device Name(s): FilmArray Gastrointestinal (GI) Panel for use with FilmArray 2.0
Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal microorganism multiplex nucleic acid-based assay
Analyte(s): Sapovirus (Genogroups I, II, IV, and V)
Specimen Type(s): Human stool in Cary Blair transport medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FilmArray Gastrointestinal (GI) Panel for use with FilmArray 2.0, a multiplex nucleic acid assay for simultaneous detection of gastrointestinal bacteria, viruses, and parasites from stool samples.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplexed nucleic acid-based in vitro diagnostic test for simultaneous detection and identification of nucleic acids from multiple GI bacteria, viruses, and parasites directly from stool samples in Cary Blair transport media; aid in diagnosis of specific agents of gastrointestinal illness, results used in conjunction with other clinical, laboratory, and epidemiological data.
